name: Double Die
description: This is tractor PTO-operated, movable clay brick-making machine is a highly efficient solution for producing large quantities of bricks with minimal manpower. Built for convenience and mobility, this machine is perfect for projects requiring high output.

Operational Requirements: Requires a 55 to 60 HP tractor to operate efficiently
Land Requirements: Requires a 200 to 250-meter length and 50 to 60-meter width of flat land for operation
Production Capacity: Capable of producing 4,000 to 6,000 bricks per hour
Material Requirements: Requires stone-free mud only to ensure smooth operation and consistent brick quality

name: Triple Die
description: This is tractor PTO-operated, movable clay brick-making machine is a highly efficient solution for producing large quantities of bricks with minimal manpower. Built for convenience and mobility, this machine is perfect for projects requiring high output.

Operational Requirements: Requires a 55 to 60 HP tractor to operate efficiently
Land Requirements: Requires a 200 to 250-meter length and 50 to 60-meter width of flat land for operation
Production Capacity: Capable of producing 6,000 to 9,000 bricks per hour
Material Requirements: Requires stone-free mud only to ensure smooth operation and consistent brick quality

name: Five Die
description: This is tractor PTO-operated, movable clay brick-making machine is a highly efficient solution for producing large quantities of bricks with minimal manpower. Built for convenience and mobility, this machine is perfect for projects requiring high output.

Operational Requirements: Requires a 60+ HP tractor to operate efficiently
Land Requirements: Requires a 250 to 300-meter length and 60 to 70-meter width of flat land for operation
Production Capacity: Capable of producing 12,000 to 14,000 bricks per hour
Material Requirements: Requires stone-free mud only to ensure smooth operation and consistent brick quality
